verses.text: The priests the Levites , \add and\add* all the tribe of Levi , shall have no part nor inheritance with Israel : they shall eat the offerings of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by fire , and his inheritance.
Therefore shall they have no inheritance among their brethren : the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* their inheritance , as he hath said unto them. \p

¶ And this shall be the priest’s due from the people , from them that offer a sacrifice , whether \add it be\add* ox or sheep ; and they shall give unto the priest the shoulder , and the two cheeks , and the maw.
The firstfruit \add also\add* of thy corn , of thy wine , and of thine oil , and the first of the fleece of thy sheep , shalt thou give him.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath chosen him out of all thy tribes , to stand to minister in the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, him and his sons for ever. \p

¶ And if a Levite come from any of thy gates out of all Israel , where he sojourned , and come with all the desire of his mind unto the place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall choose ;

Then he shall minister in the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his God , as all his brethren the Levites \add do\add*, which stand there before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
They shall have like portions to eat , beside that which cometh of the sale of his patrimony.\f + \fr 18.8 \ft that…: Heb. his sale by the fathers\f* \p
¶ When thou art come into the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not learn to do after the abominations of those nations.

There shall not be found among you \add any one\add* that maketh his son or his daughter to pass through the fire , \add or\add* that useth divination , \add or\add* an observer of times , or an enchanter , or a witch ,
Or a charmer , or a consulter with familiar spirits , or a wizard , or a necromancer.

For all that do these things \add are\add* an abomination unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and because of these abominations the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God doth drive them out from before thee.
Thou shalt be perfect with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God.\f + \fr 18.13 \ft perfect: or, upright, or, sincere\f*

For these nations , which thou shalt possess , hearkened unto observers of times , and unto diviners : but as for thee, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God hath not suffered thee so \add to do\add*.\f + \fr 18.14 \ft possess: or, inherit\f* \p
¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God will raise up unto thee a Prophet from the midst of thee, of thy brethren , like unto me; unto him ye shall hearken ;

According to all that thou desiredst of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God in Horeb in the day of the assembly , saying , Let me not hear again the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my God , neither let me see this great fire any more, that I die not.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, They have well \add spoken that\add* which they have spoken.
I will raise them up a Prophet from among their brethren , like unto thee, and will put my words in his mouth ; and he shall speak unto them all that I shall command him.
And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* whosoever will not hearken unto my words which he shall speak in my name , I will require \add it\add* of him.
But the prophet , which shall presume to speak a word in my name , which I have not commanded him to speak , or that shall speak in the name of other gods , even that prophet shall die.
And if thou say in thine heart , How shall we know the word which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not spoken ?

When a prophet speaketh in the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, if the thing follow not, nor come to pass , that \add is\add* the thing which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not spoken , \add but\add* the prophet hath spoken it presumptuously : thou shalt not be afraid of him.
